questions.question: What is the purpose of the comfyui_dagthomas custom node SDXL Auto Prompter?
questions.answer: The SDXL Auto Prompter provides easy prompting for generating endless random art pieces and photographs.

questions.question: How can I customize the subject input field in the SDXL Auto Prompter?
questions.answer: You can change the subject input field by adding your preferred style or Lora to overwrite predefined subjects like 'man, woman ...'.

questions.question: Does the SDXL Auto Prompter support custom styles or Lora for the subject input field?
questions.answer: Yes, the SDXL Auto Prompter supports custom styles or Lora for the subject input field, enabling personalization.
